name: Thunder Island Brewing
description: A scenic spot on the banks of the Columbia River with great food, micro brews, and a mix of sunny and shaded tables.

name: Bailey's Tap Room
description: bustling beer bar full of professionals having meetings or enjoying happy hour. Tech networking spot.

name: Good Coffee
description: Sunny, quiet coffee shop with compact seating. Good for two or 3, not big groups. Great coffee!

name: Good Coffee
description: great espresso, clean and usually always a seat near an outlet.

name: Breakside Brewing
description: nice patio space and big windows. good beer and food.

name: Coffee Time
description: Full of people working so it is pretty quiet and chill. Friendly staff, sidewalk seating available.
